title: PersonalBudget
description: A dashboard which can help to add/delete expences, incomes and categories and help to track the personal finance.

title: GoldDashboard app to show the price of the gold and silver in INR
description: A Dashboard which shows the glod and sliver daily price in INR using metalApis along with chart of last 5 days .A dashboard made with vibecoding using V0.dev for inital setup and github copilot for complete the dashboard.
